title: Caught in the Act
description: In this erotic story Jimmy goes around to his girlfriend's house. He and Sandy immediately start getting amorous and naked in the living room. Moira, Sandy's flat mate, arrives home unexpectedly and catches them in the act. Instead of being embarrassed and going to her room, Moira decides to join the others for some sizzling threesome fun. Adults only 18+
author: Darren G. Burton
